name: Flatcolorui
tagline: A tool to provide Flat Color Swatches with an easy click to Create Material for each color.
body:
# FlatColorUI


Create A Material from Flat Color UI Selection
![Save Colors to Material](http://i.imgur.com/w3s6BaP.gif)

Save to a Unity Palette:
![Save Colors to Palette](http://i.imgur.com/5bDvf81.gif)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
